text: The 2015 Italian Athletics Championships () was the 105th edition of the Italian Athletics Championships and were held in Turin from 24 to 26 July 2015. ==Champions== {| class="wikitable" width=70% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |- !Event !!Men !!Performance !!Women !!Performance |- |100 m||align=left|Fabio Cerutti ||10.31 (+1.0)||align=left|Gloria Hooper ||11.47 (+0.0) |- |200 m||align=left|Davide Manenti ||21.00 (-0.2)||align=left|Gloria Hooper ||23.48 (-1.5) |- |400 m||align=left|Matteo Galvan ||46.11||align=left|Libania Grenot ||51.47 |- |800 m||align=left|Giordano Benedetti ||1:47.38||align=left|Marta Zenoni ||2:04.18 |- |1500 m||align=left|Mohad Abdikadar Sheik Ali ||3:42.79||align=left|Margherita Magnani ||4:19.29 |- |5000 m||align=left|Marouan Razine ||13:50.87||align=left|Silvia Weissteiner ||16:03.55 |- |3000 m steeplechase||align=left|Jamel Chatbi ||8:30.35||align=left|Valeria Roffino ||10:07.23 |- |100 m hurdles||align=left|Hassane Fofana ||13.59 (-1.3)||align=left|Giulia Tessaro ||13.14 (+0.5) |- |400 m hurdles||align=left|Leonardo Capotosti ||49.95||align=left|Yadisleidy Pedroso ||55.96 |- |High jump||align=left|Marco Fassinotti ||2.30||align=left|Desiree Rossit ||1.86 |- |Pole vault||align=left|Claudio Stecchi ||5.50||align=left|Sonia Malavisi ||4.30 |- |Long jump||align=left|Filippo Randazzo ||7.76 (-1.1)||align=left| ||6.49 (+0.2) |- |Triple jump||align=left|Fabrizio Donato ||16.91 (+0.5)||align=left|Ottavia Cestonaro ||13.76 (+1.9) |- |Shot put||align=left|Daniele Secci ||19.18||align=left|Chiara Rosa ||17.33 |- |Discus throw||align=left|Hannes Kirchler ||60.25||align=left|Stefania Strumillo ||56.37 |- |Hammer throw||align=left| ||70.85||align=left|Silvia Salis ||67.51 |- |Javelin throw||align=left|Roberto Bertolini ||79.32||align=left|Sara Jemai ||56.39 |- |10 km walk road||align=left|Federico Tontodonati ||40:36:00||align=left|Elisa Rigaudo ||43:08:00 |- |4X100 relay||align=left|G.A.
